sentences.en: At the sub 90 nm technology node, the gate oxide thickness is expected to be 12 - 15 Angstrom.
sentences.cn: 当半导体结点技术发展到小于90纳米时, 栅氧化层厚度将减薄至12到15埃.

sentences.en: I like the angstrom because atomic dimensions are conveniently measured by angstroms.
sentences.cn: 我喜，埃，因为原子大小的东西,用埃来度量更方便。

sentences.en: I like the angstrom. It is 10 to the minus 10 meters.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢单位，埃，它等于10的负10次方米。

sentences.en: Results show that this process can reach surface roughness with angstrom dimension.
sentences.cn: 结果表明,这种抛光工艺能获得原子级的超光滑表面.

sentences.en: So that works out, an angstrom is 10 to the minus 10 meters.
sentences.cn: 这样可以计算出，一埃等于10的负10次方米。

sentences.en: The spectrum of aerosol optical thickness accords with Angstrom relation.
sentences.cn: 气溶胶光学厚度谱基本满足Angstrom关系.

sentences.en: Thickness increase of bio - layer of angstrom level can be detected.
sentences.cn: 能够测试出亚纳米级生物膜厚度的增加量.

trans.tran_en: a unit of length equal to 10–10 metre, used principally to express the wavelengths of electromagnetic radiations
